SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OD.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS order_date , DATE_FORMAT(SHIPINFO.arr_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS arr_date , DATE_FORMAT(SHIPINFO.arr_prev_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS arr_prev_date , OD.order_cd AS order_cd , SHIPINFO.staff_name AS name_delivery , WH.warehouse_nm AS warehouse_nm , DC.detail_name AS state FROM tb_order OD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT warehouse_cd, warehouse_nm FROM tb_scm_warehouse ) AS WH ON OD.warehouse_cd = WH.warehouse_cd
LEFT JOIN( SELECT tssl.order_cd AS order_cd , tssl.arr_date , tssl.arr_prev_date , staff.name AS staff_name FROM tb_scm_ship_list AS tssl LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS staff ON tssl.ship_staff_id = staff.loginID) AS SHIPINFO ON OD.order_cd = SHIPINFO.order_cd
LEFT JOIN( SELECT detail_code, group_code, detail_name FROM tb_detail_code WHERE group_code = 'STTcd' ) AS DC ON OD.STTcd = DC.detail_code
WHERE OD.STTcd IN (13, 14, 15) ORDER BY OD.order_cd DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS tot_cnt FROM tb_order WHERE STTcd IN (13, 14, 15) ORDER BY order_cd DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OD.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS order_date , DATE_FORMAT(SHIPINFO.arr_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS arr_date , DATE_FORMAT(SHIPINFO.arr_prev_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS arr_prev_date , OD.order_cd AS order_cd , DC.detail_name AS state , SHIPINFO.staff_name AS name_delivery , WH.warehouse_nm AS warehouse_nm FROM tb_order OD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT warehouse_cd, warehouse_nm FROM tb_scm_warehouse ) AS WH ON OD.warehouse_cd = WH.warehouse_cd
LEFT JOIN( SELECT tssl.order_cd AS order_cd , tssl.arr_date , tssl.arr_prev_date , staff.name AS staff_name FROM tb_scm_ship_list AS tssl LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS staff ON tssl.ship_staff_id = staff.loginID) AS SHIPINFO ON OD.order_cd = SHIPINFO.order_cd
LEFT JOIN( SELECT detail_code, group_code, detail_name FROM tb_detail_code WHERE group_code = 'STTcd' ) AS DC ON OD.STTcd = DC.detail_code
WHERE OD.STTcd = #{STTcd} AND OD.order_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') ORDER BY OD.order_cd DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS tot_cnt FROM tb_order WHERE STTcd = #{STTcd} OR STTcd IN (13, 14, 15) AND order_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') ORDER BY order_cd DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(OD.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS order_date , shipList.ship_list_no AS ship_list_no , OD.order_cd AS order_cd , tsp.m_ct_nm , tsp.prod_nm , OD.order_cnt AS order_cnt , CUSTOMER.name AS name_customer , CUSTOMER.tel AS tel_customer , CUSTOMER.addr AS addr , shipList.scm_name AS name_scm , shipList.staff_name AS name_delivery , shipList.staff_tel AS tel_delivery , WH.warehouse_nm AS warehouse_nm , DATE_FORMAT(shipList.arr_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS arr_date , DATE_FORMAT(shipList.arr_prev_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS arr_prev_date , OD.STTcd AS state , IFNULL(OD.request, " - ") AS request FROM tb_order OD
LEFT JOIN( SELECT tb_scm_product.product_cd AS product_cd , tb_scm_product.prod_nm AS prod_nm , tb_scm_m_category.m_ct_nm AS m_ct_nm FROM tb_scm_product LEFT JOIN tb_scm_m_category ON tb_scm_product.m_ct_cd = tb_scm_m_category.m_ct_cd) AS tsp ON OD.product_cd = tsp.product_cd
LEFT JOIN( SELECT tssl.order_cd AS order_cd , scm.name AS scm_name , staff.name AS staff_name , staff.tel AS staff_tel , mng.name AS mng_name , tssl.ship_list_no AS ship_list_no , tssl.arr_date AS arr_date , tssl.arr_prev_date AS arr_prev_date FROM tb_scm_ship_list tssl LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS scm ON tssl.scm_id = scm.loginID LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS staff ON tssl.ship_staff_id = staff.loginID LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo AS mng ON tssl.ship_mng_id = mng.loginID) AS shipList ON OD.order_cd = shipList.order_cd
LEFT JOIN( SELECT loginID , name , tel , addr FROM tb_userinfo ) AS CUSTOMER ON OD.loginID = CUSTOMER.loginID
LEFT JOIN( SELECT warehouse_cd , warehouse_nm FROM tb_scm_warehouse) AS WH ON OD.warehouse_cd = WH.warehouse_cd
WHERE OD.order_cd = #{order_cd}
SELECT name AS dlv_staff_name , loginID FROM tb_userinfo WHERE user_type like "H"
